text: The Kansas Department of CorrectionsHome Page, Kansas Department of Corrections is a government organization of Kansas. It is in charge of Kansas's prisons. This includes prisons for both children and adults. They are in charge of the Kansas's parole system, they are in charge of Kansas's Prisoner Review Board. It is located in Topeka.Contacts, KDOC. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Corrections
title: Kansas Department of Corrections
